original: 'di rnams las pha rol gyi di si dag las dang por a'it a'a ga ma 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams las pha rol gyi di si dag las dang por a'it a'a ga ma 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rud sogs las byings thams cad pa la'o zhes pas ait thob pa la'o // aa ro d'i ta /

original: aa ro d'i:/ aa sva p'i ta /
analyzed: aa ro d'i:/ aa sva p'i ta /

analyzed: aa sva p'i:/ aa shva sit / aa shva s'i:/ pra n'it /

original: pra n'i:/ aadza ksh'i ta /
analyzed: pra n'i:/ aadza ksh'i ta /

analyzed: aadzaksh'i:/ l'a rnams smos pa las 'dir mi 'gyur te /

original: @236b aa dz'a garbha b'an /
analyzed: @236b aa dz'a garbha b'an /

original: yon tan no //
analyzed: yon tan no //

original: gsal byed di si dag ces pas di dbyi'o //
analyzed: gsal byed di si dag ces pas di dbyi'o //

original: aad las aata'o //
analyzed: aad las aata'o //

original: aad za ba la'o zhes pa 'di las pha rol gyi di si dag las dang por a'it a'a gam 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aad za ba la'o zhes pa 'di las pha rol gyi di si dag las dang por a'it a'a gam 'gyur ro //
translated: From a, eating. Of these, the first of the following d and s is ādit.

original: ta yig ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: ta yig ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i don to //
translated: The syllable ta has the meaning of various kinds.🔽ādat

original: a'a da ta /
analyzed: a'a da ta /

original: a'ad:/ aa'i yi ge'i a'a yig go zhes pas a'a yig go //
analyzed: a'ad:/ aa'i yi ge'i a'a yig go zhes pas a'a yig go //

original: rud sogs las kyang 'dod de /
analyzed: rud sogs las kyang 'dod de /

original: aa ro dat /🔽aa rod:/ aa sva bat /
analyzed: aa ro dat / aa rod:/ aa sva bat /

original: aa sva pa:/ aa shva sat /
analyzed: aa sva pa:/ aa shva sat /

analyzed: aa shva sa:/ pr'a na ta /

original: pr'a na:/ aa dza kshat /
analyzed: pr'a na:/ aa dza kshat /

original: aa dza ksha:/ sa'i sa la byings thams cad pa min pa la ta'o //
analyzed: aa dza ksha:/ sa'i sa la byings thams cad pa min pa la ta'o //

analyzed: sa'i te sa yig dang po can byings thams cad pa min pa pha rol la ta nyid du 'gyur ro //

original: bat+sya ti / bas gnas pa /🔽bi bat+sa ti /🔽sana'o ; / dzighat+sa ti /
analyzed: bat+sya ti / bas gnas pa / bi bat+sa ti / sana'o ; / dzighat+sa ti /

analyzed: aa di'i san aa dya ta m'i dag la ghasli'o zhes pas ghasli'o //
translated: The syllable gha is for the roots ending in a sibilant and having the syllable a at the beginning.

original: gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: gnyis brjod do //

original: sa'i sa la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: sa'i sa la zhes pa ci zhe na /

analyzed: bakshyati / btsa smra ba la'o // sa la zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: bast'a / byings thams cad pa min pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: bast'a / byings thams cad pa min pa zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: a'assi / aas nye bar 'jug pa la'o //🔽aa na la ba tsi'i au pa dh'a'i ao'o //
analyzed: a'assi / aas nye bar 'jug pa la'o // aa na la ba tsi'i au pa dh'a'i ao'o //

analyzed: btsi'o // au pa dh'a'i aan pha rol la ao nyid du 'gyur ro // aa bo tsa ta /
translated: The syllable au is for the roots ending in a sibilant and having the syllable a at the beginning.🔽avokṣat,🔽avokṣatām,

original: aa bo tsa t'am /🔽aa bo tsa na /
analyzed: aa bo tsa t'am / aa bo tsa na /

original: aa su ba tsi zhes pas aana'o //
analyzed: aa su ba tsi zhes pas aana'o //

original: aa sya ti'i mtha' tha'o //
analyzed: aa sya ti'i mtha' tha'o //

original: aa su 'phan pa la'o zhes pa 'di'i aan pha rol la aa yig a'a ga ma 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aa su 'phan pa la'o zhes pa 'di'i aan pha rol la aa yig a'a ga ma 'gyur ro //

original: a'asthata / snga ma bzhin du aana'o //
analyzed: a'asthata / snga ma bzhin du aana'o //

original: shva ya ti'i aa'o //
analyzed: shva ya ti'i aa'o //

original: tu ao shvi 'gro ba dang 'phel ba dag la'o zhes pa 'di'i aan pha rol la aa yig tu bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tu ao shvi 'gro ba dang 'phel ba dag la'o zhes pa 'di'i aan pha rol la aa yig tu bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //

original: aa shvat / 'di nyid las shva ya ti'i aa yig tu bsgyur ba sgrub pa'i phyir aa na'o //
analyzed: aa shvat / 'di nyid las shva ya ti'i aa yig tu bsgyur ba sgrub pa'i phyir aa na'o //

original: ba ti'i papti'o //
analyzed: ba ti'i papti'o //

original: patli 'gro ba la'o zhes pa 'di'i aan pha rol la paptir bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: patli 'gro ba la'o zhes pa 'di'i aan pha rol la paptir bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //

original: ai yig ni brjod pa'i don to //
analyzed: ai yig ni brjod pa'i don to //

original: aa baptat / pusha sogs kyi mdos aana'o //
analyzed: aa baptat / pusha sogs kyi mdos aana'o //

original: kri pa'i ra'i la'o //
analyzed: kri pa'i ra'i la'o //

original: kri pu nus pa la'o zhes pa 'di'i yon tan byas pa'i ra yig gang yin pa de la nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kri pu nus pa la'o zhes pa 'di'i yon tan byas pa'i ra yig gang yin pa de la nyid du 'gyur ro //

original: kalpta / kalpsya ti /
analyzed: kalpta / kalpsya ti /

original: yon tan no //
analyzed: yon tan no //
translated: It is a quality.

original: ra yig gi la yig go //
analyzed: ra yig gi la yig go //

original: kli pi tsri ti min pa'i ri ta au pa dh'a las kyang ngo zhes pa'i shes par byed par las ri yig gi li yig tu bsgyur bar 'dod de /
analyzed: kli pi tsri ti min pa'i ri ta au pa dh'a las kyang ngo zhes pa'i shes par byed par las ri yig gi li yig tu bsgyur bar 'dod de /
translated: And from the root rīta, “to go,” the form rīta is also produced, not only the form upadhā.🔽Thus,

original: des na ; tsiklipsati /
analyzed: des na ; tsiklipsati /

original: sana'o // gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: sana'o // gnyis brjod do //

analyzed: mchog gi sbyor ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas gzhan la yang ra yig gi ma nyid du yang na bshad par bya ste /

original: b'a ra:/ b'a la:/
analyzed: b'a ra:/ b'a la:/

original: mu ram / mu lam /
analyzed: mu ram / mu lam /

analyzed: aa ram / au su la:/ au su ra:/ pa li gha:/

analyzed: pa ri gha:/ pa lyangka:/ aar++yangka:/ aa ya ti las nyer bsgyur gyi'o //

analyzed: ra'i la @237a * //

original: zhes pa kho na'o //
analyzed: zhes pa kho na'o //

original: aa ya ti la ste /
analyzed: aa ya ti la ste /

analyzed: aa ya 'gro ba la'o zhes pa 'di pha rol la nyer bsgyur gyi ra yig gang yin pa de la nyid du 'gyur ro // pa l'a ya te /

original: pa l'a ye te /🔽pa l'a yante /
analyzed: pa l'a ye te / pa l'a yante /

original: aa ya 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: aa ya 'gro ba la'o //

original: ba r'a sngon du'o //
analyzed: ba r'a sngon du'o //

original: 'dis ra'i la'o //
analyzed: 'dis ra'i la'o //

analyzed: a'a te a'a the zhes pa'ang ngo zhes pas ai'o //

analyzed: pa r'a ya ya ta te /

analyzed: ya t'i 'bad pa la'o //

analyzed: gi ra ti'i tsa kr'i yi ta la'o //

analyzed: gri gsal ba la'o zhes pa 'di'i tse kr'i yit pha rol la ra yig gang yin pa de la nyid du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: smad pa gsal bar byed do la ya sgra'o //

analyzed: 'dis la nyid do //

analyzed: gnyis brjod do //

original: tse kr'i yi ta la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: tse kr'i yi ta la zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: ni g'ir++ya te /
analyzed: ni g'ir++ya te /

analyzed: dbyangs la yang na'o //

analyzed: gi ra ti'i ra yig dbyangs pha rol la yang na ra nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The ra of girati also becomes ra for the other side of svarita.

original: ni gi ra ti /
analyzed: ni gi ra ti /
translated: Nigirati🔽

original: ni gi la ti /
analyzed: ni gi la ti /
translated: ni, gha, la, ṭi,

original: aana'o / aira'o ;
analyzed: aana'o / aira'o ;
translated: Aṅ, oṃ.🔽Ai, oṃ.

original: / yang na la nyid do //
analyzed: / yang na la nyid do //
translated: or la itself.

original: ni ga lan ma ni gar nam /
analyzed: ni ga lan ma ni gar nam /
translated: ni, ga, la, na is ni-ga-la-na.

original: yut 'ang ngo zhes pas yuta'o //
analyzed: yut 'ang ngo zhes pas yuta'o //

original: yang na'i sgra rnam par gzhag pa rnam par bshad pa shes par byed pa las /
analyzed: yang na'i sgra rnam par gzhag pa rnam par bshad pa shes par byed pa las /
translated: In the presentation of the particle na, the explanatory knowledge is:🔽praṇ, dyad, ge, ga la,

original: prandyadge ga la:/ bi she tu ga ra:/
analyzed: prandyadge ga la:/ bi she tu ga ra:/
translated: vi, śe, tu, ga ra.

original: 'di rnams las sa tsa sogs las aa tsa'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams las sa tsa sogs las aa tsa'o //

original: byings kyi gsum pa dang po gha dha dha bha mtha'i dang pos dhva dag la bzhi pa nyid do //
analyzed: byings kyi gsum pa dang po gha dha dha bha mtha'i dang pos dhva dag la bzhi pa nyid do //
translated: The third of the root and the first of gha, dha, dha, bha, the final, has the first, thus the fourth.

original: cha shas gang gi dang po gsum pa yin pa de gsum pa dang po'o //
analyzed: cha shas gang gi dang po gsum pa yin pa de gsum pa dang po'o //
translated: That which has the third of its parts as first is the third of the first.

original: gha dang dha dang dha dang bha mtha' can zhes zlas dbye khong na gnas pa'i 'bru mang po pa'o //
analyzed: gha dang dha dang dha dang bha mtha' can zhes zlas dbye khong na gnas pa'i 'bru mang po pa'o //
translated: Gha, dha, dha, bha, the final, is the repetition, the many syllables within.

original: dang po'i bzhi pa ni dang po bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: dang po'i bzhi pa ni dang po bzhi pa ste /
translated: The fourth of the first is the fourth of the first.

original: dang po'i dngos po bzhi pa nyid do //
analyzed: dang po'i dngos po bzhi pa nyid do //
translated: The fourth of the first is the fourth of the first.

original: byings gang gi cha shas gsum pa dang po'o //
analyzed: byings gang gi cha shas gsum pa dang po'o //
translated: That which has the third of its parts as first.

original: gha dang dha dang dha dang bha'i mtha' can gyi dang po gang yin pa de sa yig dang hve'i sgra pha rol la rang gi sde la yod pa'i bzhi par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gha dang dha dang dha dang bha'i mtha' can gyi dang po gang yin pa de sa yig dang hve'i sgra pha rol la rang gi sde la yod pa'i bzhi par 'gyur ro //
translated: The first of those ending in ga, dha, da, and bha is the letter sa, and the sound hva becomes the fourth of its own class in the other.

original: aa dhokshyata / aa gho kshyata /
analyzed: aa dhokshyata / aa gho kshyata /
translated: adhokṣaja, aghoṣaja,

original: aa bhot+syat / du ha 'jo ba la'o //
analyzed: aa bhot+syat / du ha 'jo ba la'o //
translated: abhotṣaja.🔽duha means to milk.

original: gu h'u sdom par byed pa la'o //
analyzed: gu h'u sdom par byed pa la'o //
translated: guha means to bind.

original: buddha rtogs pa la'o //
analyzed: buddha rtogs pa la'o //
translated: buddha means to understand.

original: bya ba shor ba'i syat dang / byings kyi dang por aata'o;/🔽du ha'i da dang po'i gha'o //
analyzed: bya ba shor ba'i syat dang / byings kyi dang por aata'o;/ du ha'i da dang po'i gha'o //
translated: The syllable syat is used for the loss of the action, and at is at the beginning of the root.🔽The first of duha is gha.

original: gu ha'i ha'i dha'o //
analyzed: gu ha'i ha'i dha'o //
translated: The first of guha is ha.

original: 'dis dang po'i bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis dang po'i bzhi pa'o //
translated: This is the fourth of the first.

original: sgra med pa rnams la zhes pas gha'i ka dang dha'i ta'o //
analyzed: sgra med pa rnams la zhes pas gha'i ka dang dha'i ta'o //
translated: Since it is said that there are no voiced consonants, the ka of gha and the ta of dha.

original: sha dha dag gi sa la ka'o //
analyzed: sha dha dag gi sa la ka'o //
translated: The sa of śa and dha is ka.🔽dhi means to protect.

original: dhipsati / danbhu chu la 'chos pa la'o //
analyzed: dhipsati / danbhu chu la 'chos pa la'o //
translated: danbhu means to play in the water.

original: sa na'o // gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: sa na'o // gnyis brjod do //
translated: san means two.

original: danbhu'i ai ta'ang ngo zhes pas ai nyid dang aa bhyas dbyi ba'ang ngo //
analyzed: danbhu'i ai ta'ang ngo zhes pas ai nyid dang aa bhyas dbyi ba'ang ngo //
translated: Since it is said that the ai of danbhu is also so, ai itself and abhya are also so.🔽This is the dha of da.

original: 'dis da'i dha'o// @237b 'dod pa'i dbang las na dbyi'o //
analyzed: 'dis da'i dha'o// @237b 'dod pa'i dbang las na dbyi'o //
translated: Since it is from the power of desire, it is dya.

original: sgra med pa rnams las zhes pas bha'i pa'o //
analyzed: sgra med pa rnams las zhes pas bha'i pa'o //
translated: From the soundless [comes] the Bha-Pa.

original: dhokshya ti / duha 'jo ba /
analyzed: dhokshya ti / duha 'jo ba /
translated: Duh-O is to be borne,

original: sya ti'o // da dang po'i gha'o //
analyzed: sya ti'o // da dang po'i gha'o //
translated: and the first Ga is to be.

original: 'dis da'i dha'o //
analyzed: 'dis da'i dha'o //
translated: This [is] the Dha.

original: dang po dang mtha' bzhin du gcig la'o zhes pa'i tshig las du ha'i sgra byings la cha shas so //
analyzed: dang po dang mtha' bzhin du gcig la'o zhes pa'i tshig las du ha'i sgra byings la cha shas so //
translated: As in the beginning and end, [it is] in one [place]. From the word in one [place], the sound Duh is a part of the root.

original: dhva'i sgra la'ang /🔽aa dhu gdhvam /
analyzed: dhva'i sgra la'ang / aa dhu gdhvam /
translated: Also in the sound Dha-Vha,🔽 Adhu-Gha-Vha.

original: duha 'jo ba /
analyzed: duha 'jo ba /
translated: Duh-O is to be borne,

original: aa dya ta n'i'i dhva ma'o //
analyzed: aa dya ta n'i'i dhva ma'o //
translated: and the first A-Dya-Ta-Ni is the Vha-Ma.

original: byings kyi dang por aata'o //
analyzed: byings kyi dang por aata'o //
translated: The first of the root is A-Ta.

original: ait med pa shit mtha' zhes pas sana'o //
analyzed: ait med pa shit mtha' zhes pas sana'o //
translated: Without the I, the last of the Shi is the Na.

original: bshad pa las de 'jig go //
analyzed: bshad pa las de 'jig go //
translated: It is explained as to be destroyed.

original: da dang po'i gha'o //
analyzed: da dang po'i gha'o //
translated: The first of the Da is the Ga.

original: 'dis da'i dha'o //
analyzed: 'dis da'i dha'o //
translated: This [is] the Dha.

original: dhut rnams kyi gsum pa'o zhes pas gha'i ga'o //
analyzed: dhut rnams kyi gsum pa'o zhes pas gha'i ga'o //
translated: The third of the Dhutas is the Ga of the Gha.

original: n+ya ghu dhvam /
analyzed: n+ya ghu dhvam /
translated: Nyu-Gha-Vha.

original: gu hu sgrib pa la'o //
analyzed: gu hu sgrib pa la'o //
translated: Gu-Gu is to be hidden.

original: ni sngon du'o //
analyzed: ni sngon du'o //
translated: Ni is in front.

original: dhvama'o // sana'o //
analyzed: dhvama'o // sana'o //

analyzed: byings thams cad pa la'o zhes pa kho na'o //

analyzed: a'i sha dbang phyug la'o zhes pa 'di las pa rol gyi sa las te /

analyzed: sa yig dang po can gyi byings thams cad pa pha rol la dang por ait a'a ga mar 'gyur ro // a'i shi she /

original: a'i shi shva /🔽a'id dzan dag gi sa dang dhva la'ang ngo //
analyzed: a'i shi shva / a'id dzan dag gi sa dang dhva la'ang ngo //

original: byings thams cad pa la'o zhes pa kho na'o //
analyzed: byings thams cad pa la'o zhes pa kho na'o //

original: a'it bstod pa la'o //
analyzed: a'it bstod pa la'o //

original: dzan skye ba la'o //
analyzed: dzan skye ba la'o //

analyzed: 'ang gi sgra las a'i sha las kyang ngo // a'i dishe / a'i dishva /

analyzed: a'i didhve / aididhvam / brta m'a ni'i se dang dhve'o //

analyzed: bya ti dzadznyishva /

analyzed: dza n'i rab tu skye ba la'o zhes pa 'di gzung bar bya ba ma yin te /

original: rjes su 'jug go //
analyzed: rjes su 'jug go //

analyzed: sa yig la dang por ait a'a gam 'gyur ro //

original: dzi ga mi sha /

original: aa dh'a b'i ta /
analyzed: aa dh'a b'i ta /

analyzed: aa dhoshta / aa dhabishta / ya mi ra mi na mi a'at mtha' rnams kyi si mtha' 'ang ngo //

analyzed: de nas zlas dbye'o // ya mu nye bar 'gog pa la'o ;
translated: Then, the compound is formed.🔽 Yamu means to stop.🔽 Ramu means to play.🔽 Rimu means to be born.

analyzed: / ra mu rtse ba la'o //

original: nam 'dud pa dang sgra la'o //
analyzed: nam 'dud pa dang sgra la'o //

analyzed: ya mir min mi zhes pa dang a'at las dbyangs gcig pa ait yin no zhes pa'i yang dgag pa 'gegs pa'o //

analyzed: y'a thob pa la'o //

analyzed: au'i yi ge dang gu pa sogs rnams las kyang ngo //

analyzed: au'i yi ge smos pas au yig mtha' can dang au yig mtha' can rnams kyang gzung bar bya ste /

analyzed: au yig mtha' can rnams ni /

original: lu lu sha ti /
analyzed: lu lu sha ti /

analyzed: dbyangs mtha' rnams kyis na la zhes pas ring po'o //

analyzed: gup ti dza kita rnams las sana'o //

analyzed: m'an brda d'an zhes sogs kyis kyang sana'o //

analyzed: ba hi las byings kyi gsum pa dang po'i bha dha dha bha zhes pa ba'i bha'o //

analyzed: bhu las si tsa 'jig pa la'o //

analyzed: kri sri bri bhri stu dru shru sru rnams nyid las pa ro& ksh'a la'o //

original: dag gi tshig nges par bstan pa mi rtag pa ste /
analyzed: dag gi tshig nges par bstan pa mi rtag pa ste /
translated: The word is taught with the indeclinable particle a.

original: des na brinya las thal la dgag pa mi nus te /🔽bab ri tha /
analyzed: des na brinya las thal la dgag pa mi nus te / bab ri tha /
translated: Therefore, the prohibition is not possible from the two.

original: ri yig las thal la'o //
analyzed: ri yig las thal la'o //
translated: From the letter ri, there is thal.🔽From the letter ri, there is thal.🔽From the one ending in the letter ri, there is thal.

original: ri yig mtha' can las thal la aita a'a ga ma mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ri yig mtha' can las thal la aita a'a ga ma mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It does not become āgama.

original: snga ma'i nges pa thob pa la'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i nges pa thob pa la'o //
translated: It is for the attainment of the former certainty.

original: dadhvartha / dza hartha /
analyzed: dadhvartha / dza hartha /
translated: Dhvārtha, jahārtha,

original: dhri gnad pa la'o //
analyzed: dhri gnad pa la'o //
translated: dhri is for the purpose of the vital point.

original: hrinya 'phrog pa la'o //
analyzed: hrinya 'phrog pa la'o //
translated: Hri is for the purpose of stealing.

original: shvast'a n'i la rtag tu aita med pa'i nges pa nye bar bstan pa la aa yig ldan pa'i byings las thal la aita yang na bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: shvast'a n'i la rtag tu aita med pa'i nges pa nye bar bstan pa la aa yig ldan pa'i byings las thal la aita yang na bshad par bya'o //
translated: In śvastāna, the teaching of the absence of ita is always to be explained from the verbal root endowed with the letter a.

original: nye bar bstan pa ni mdo bklags pa dang byings bklags pa 'ang ngo //
analyzed: nye bar bstan pa ni mdo bklags pa dang byings bklags pa 'ang ngo //
translated: The teaching is also the reading of the sūtra and the reading of the verbal root.

original: pa paktha / pe tse tha /
analyzed: pa paktha / pe tse tha /
translated: Papaktha, pecettha,

original: shvasta n'i la aita med pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: shvasta n'i la aita med pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is meant by “in śvastāna, there is no ita”?

original: dzagha sitha / aa di'i pa ro& ksh'a la yang na'o zhes pas gha sli'o //
analyzed: dzagha sitha / aa di'i pa ro& ksh'a la yang na'o zhes pas gha sli'o //
translated: Jhaghasi, adiparokṣa, and akṣālayam also.

original: shvasta n'i la ghas la ait dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir rtag tu aita med pa nye bar bstan pa med do //
analyzed: shvasta n'i la ghas la ait dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir rtag tu aita med pa nye bar bstan pa med do //
translated: Because of the presence of the anusvāra, the absence of anusvāra is always indicated.

original: rtag tu smos pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: rtag tu smos pa ci zhe na /
translated: Why is it always mentioned?🔽Ānanyajihth.

original: a'a nanydzitha / aandzu gsal ba la'o //🔽thala'o // aita'o //
analyzed: a'a nanydzitha / aandzu gsal ba la'o // thala'o // aita'o //
translated: Anj is clear.🔽Tha is the visarga.🔽It is the first.

original: dang po a'i thams cad du zhes pas ring po'o //
analyzed: dang po a'i thams cad du zhes pas ring po'o //
translated: Ā is all.

original: de las na a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: de las na a'a ga ma'o //
translated: Therefore, āgama.🔽From anj, or because of it, it is.🔽Therefore, in one part, the absence of anusvāra exists.🔽This is the analysis.

original: aandzi las yang na aita nyid kyi phyir phyogs gcig la aita med pa nyid yod ces rnam bar brtag par 'gyuru ro ba la rtag tu smos pas mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aandzi las yang na aita nyid kyi phyir phyogs gcig la aita med pa nyid yod ces rnam bar brtag par 'gyuru ro ba la rtag tu smos pas mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But because of the always mentioned, it is not so.

original: nye bar bsnyan pa la zhes ba ci zhe na /
analyzed: nye bar bsnyan pa la zhes ba ci zhe na /
translated: What is the indication?🔽Cakṛṣṭha.

original: tsakarshi tha / krisha 'bri ba la'o //
analyzed: tsakarshi tha / krisha 'bri ba la'o //
translated: Kṛṣ is writing.

original: yon tan byas par gyur pa na 'di aa yig dang ldan pa ni nye bar bstan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yon tan byas par gyur pa na 'di aa yig dang ldan pa ni nye bar bstan pa ma yin no //
translated: When the quality is made, this one with the letter a is not the indication.

original: de bzhin du dbyangs mtha' rnams las dang pro dzitri sha dag las kyang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du dbyangs mtha' rnams las dang pro dzitri sha dag las kyang ngo //
translated: In the same way, from the final vowels, and from pro and jitrīṣa.🔽Yāyath.

original: ya y'atha / ya yitha /
analyzed: ya y'atha / ya yitha /
translated: Yāyīth.

original: @244b sasrashtha / sa sardzitha /
analyzed: @244b sasrashtha / sa sardzitha /
translated: Srasth.

original: da trashtha dadarshitha /
analyzed: da trashtha dadarshitha /
translated: Now, from traṣṭha, dṛṣṭha,

original: sridzi tisha dag las aa yig a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: sridzi tisha dag las aa yig a'a ga ma'o //
translated: and sṛṣṭi, the a-vowel is āgama.

original: bridza sogs rnams kyi sha'o //
analyzed: bridza sogs rnams kyi sha'o //
translated: From bṛṃha and so on, the ś-vowel.

original: tsha shad dag gi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: tsha shad dag gi 'ang ngo //
translated: From tsa and ṣa, the ṅ-vowel.

original: zhes pas sha nyid do //
analyzed: zhes pas sha nyid do //
translated: Thus, it is śa itself.

original: aa di / aatti bye nya rnams kyi thal la rtag par 'dod de /
analyzed: aa di / aatti bye nya rnams kyi thal la rtag par 'dod de /
translated: From adi, atthi, bheñña, the thal is always desired.

original: aadi las aa yig dang ldan pa nyid las rnam par brtag pa thob pa la'o //
analyzed: aadi las aa yig dang ldan pa nyid las rnam par brtag pa thob pa la'o //
translated: From adi, the one endowed with the a-vowel, the attainment of analysis.

original: byeny las kyang dbyangs mtha' nyid las so //
analyzed: byeny las kyang dbyangs mtha' nyid las so //
translated: From bheñña, from the final vowel itself.

original: aatti las ni dgag pa thob pa la'o //🔽a'a di tha /
analyzed: aatti las ni dgag pa thob pa la'o // a'a di tha /
translated: From atthi, the attainment of negation.🔽From ādi, tha.

original: aa di las thala'o //
analyzed: aa di las thala'o //
translated: From adi, the thal.

original: gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: gnyis brjod do //
translated: It is expressed twice.

original: dang po'i aa'i thams cad cu zhes pas ring po'o //
analyzed: dang po'i aa'i thams cad cu zhes pas ring po'o //
translated: The first ā is all, thus it is long.

original: a'a ritha / ri 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: a'a ritha / ri 'gro ba la'o //
translated: From ṛ, the going.

original: thala'o // gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: thala'o // gnyis brjod do //
translated: The thal is expressed twice.

original: snga ma bzhin ring po'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin ring po'o //
translated: As before, it is long.

original: aita'o // yon tan no //🔽bye nya'i bi bya yi tha /
analyzed: aita'o // yon tan no // bye nya'i bi bya yi tha /
translated: From iti, the quality.🔽From bheñña, the vi of vya, the tha.

original: pa ro& ksh'a la gnyis ka rnams kyi aa bhy'a sa'i zhes pa sam pra s'a rana'o //
analyzed: pa ro& ksh'a la gnyis ka rnams kyi aa bhy'a sa'i zhes pa sam pra s'a rana'o //
translated: From paro and kṣāla, the abhyāsa of both is samprasāraṇa.

original: krinya las sut med pa las so //
analyzed: krinya las sut med pa las so //
translated: From kṛñ, without sut.

original: gang la suta yod pa min pa zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: gang la suta yod pa min pa zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase “that which does not have a sutra” should be supplied in each case.

original: pa ro& ksha la zhes pa 'jug go //
analyzed: pa ro& ksha la zhes pa 'jug go //
translated: The word “without” is to be supplied to all of these.🔽The word “without” is supplied to kṣa.

original: krinya las sut med pa ste suta a'a ga ma dang bral ba las pa ro& ksha la aita a'a ga ma mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: krinya las sut med pa ste suta a'a ga ma dang bral ba las pa ro& ksha la aita a'a ga ma mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The word “without” is supplied to kṛt, but it does not come after suta.

original: tsakrib / tsakrim /
analyzed: tsakrib / tsakrim /
translated: cakṛb cakṛm

original: tsa kartha suta med pa las zhes pa ci zhe na /🔽sam tsam ka ri ba /🔽sam tsa ska ri ma /
analyzed: tsa kartha suta med pa las zhes pa ci zhe na / sam tsam ka ri ba / sam tsa ska ri ma /
translated: cakarthe suta. What is it?

original: samtsa ska ritha /
analyzed: samtsa ska ritha /
translated: samcaṃkariva samcaṃkarima

original: du krinya byed /
analyzed: du krinya byed /
translated: samcaṃkarittha🔽dukriṇā

original: sngam sngon du'o //
analyzed: sngam sngon du'o //
translated: before.

original: sam pa ri au pa las rgyan las suta'o zhes pas suta'o //
analyzed: sam pa ri au pa las rgyan las suta'o zhes pas suta'o //
translated: samparivau alaṃkāre sutau iti sutau.

original: gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: gnyis brjod do //
translated: The two are expressed.

original: shita las pha rol gyi sgra med pa'o //
analyzed: shita las pha rol gyi sgra med pa'o //
translated: śit without the sound of the other.

original: brtsegs pa dang po'i rita'i yang ngo zhes pas yon tan no //
analyzed: brtsegs pa dang po'i rita'i yang ngo zhes pas yon tan no //
translated: The first of the layers is also ṛti. Thus, it is a quality.

original: sam pa ri au pa rnams las ka ro ti la rgyan dang 'dus pal 'da suta'o //
analyzed: sam pa ri au pa rnams las ka ro ti la rgyan dang 'dus pal 'da suta'o //
translated: samparivau karotyalaṃkāre saṃvarte sutau.

original: sam dang pa ri dang au pa zhes pa 'di rnams las pha rol gyi ka ro ti la rgyan dang 'dus pa'i don las suta a'a ga ma 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sam dang pa ri dang au pa zhes pa 'di rnams las pha rol gyi ka ro ti la rgyan dang 'dus pa'i don las suta a'a ga ma 'gyur ro //
translated: From sam, pari, and upa, the suffix -ta is added to the foreign word karoti, meaning “to adorn” or “to assemble.”

original: ta yig ni sngon gyi slob dpon rnams la rab tu grags pas sa yig a'a ga ma dang por bstan pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: ta yig ni sngon gyi slob dpon rnams la rab tu grags pas sa yig a'a ga ma dang por bstan pa'i don du'o //
translated: The letter ta is taught first because it is well known to former masters.

original: au yig ni brjod pa'i don to //🔽sam skart'a / aus skart'a /
analyzed: au yig ni brjod pa'i don to // sam skart'a / aus skart'a /
translated: The letter u is for the meaning of expression.🔽Sam-skṛta, u-skṛta,

original: sam kart'a / sam kartum /
analyzed: sam kart'a / sam kartum /
translated: sam-skṛta, sam-kṛtum,

original: samkartabyam / sam dang pa ri dang au pa rnams las zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: samkartabyam / sam dang pa ri dang au pa rnams las zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: sam-kṛtya, sam, pari, and upa. What are they?

original: pra ka ro ti /
analyzed: pra ka ro ti /
translated: Pra-karoti.

original: ka ro ti pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: ka ro ti pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: Karoti-pa. What is it?

original: sam bha ba ti /
analyzed: sam bha ba ti /
translated: Sam-bhavati.

original: rgyan dang 'dus pa la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: rgyan dang 'dus pa la zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: Adornment and assembly. What is it?

original: samkart'a / pa rikart'a /
analyzed: samkart'a / pa rikart'a /
translated: Sam-kṛta, pari-kṛta,

original: au pa kart'a /
analyzed: au pa kart'a /
translated: upa-kṛta.

original: jo bo drag 'byor gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa slob ma la phan par kun bshad pa'i rab tu byed pa bdun pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: jo bo drag 'byor gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa slob ma la phan par kun bshad pa'i rab tu byed pa bdun pa rdzogs so /
translated: The seventh chapter of the commentary composed by the venerable Drahīyaśas, which is beneficial for students, is completed.

original: // / tshig mthar dhuta rnams kyi dang po'o //
analyzed: // / tshig mthar dhuta rnams kyi dang po'o //
translated: The first of the dhutas at the end of the words.

original: tshig mthar 'jug pa'i dhuta rnams kyi dang por 'gyur ro //🔽tvatan ya nam /
analyzed: tshig mthar 'jug pa'i dhuta rnams kyi dang por 'gyur ro // tvatan ya nam /
translated: The first of the dhutas that are added to the end of words.🔽Tvaṃ yānam

original: tvanna ya nam /🔽aartha bhu ta n'a tha:/
analyzed: tvanna ya nam / aartha bhu ta n'a tha:/
translated: Tvaṃ yānam🔽Artha bhūta nāthaḥ

original: aartha bhutt'a tha /
analyzed: aartha bhutt'a tha /
translated: Artha bhūta āttha

original: ha dang bzhi pa mtha' can zhes pas bha'o //
analyzed: ha dang bzhi pa mtha' can zhes pas bha'o //
translated: Ha and the fourth with an ending, that is, bho.

original: 'dis dang po'o //
analyzed: 'dis dang po'o //
translated: This is the first.

original: lnga @245a * //
analyzed: lnga @245a * //
translated: The fifth

original: pa la lnga pa yang na'o zhes pas ta'i na'o //
analyzed: pa la lnga pa yang na'o zhes pas ta'i na'o //
translated: with the fifth, also na, that is, tvai.

original: tshig mthar zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: tshig mthar zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is meant by “at the end of a word”?

original: badmam / tsi ste /
analyzed: badmam / tsi ste /
translated: Baddham, ci ste.🔽Also na in the perfect, that is, gal te.

original: rdzogs pa la yang na'o zhes pas gal te 'di ci'i yul yin zhe na /
analyzed: rdzogs pa la yang na'o zhes pas gal te 'di ci'i yul yin zhe na /
translated: If this is the object of what?

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: It should be said.

original: gang la pha rol gyi yi ge mi dmigs pa'i de dang de'i yul lo //
analyzed: gang la pha rol gyi yi ge mi dmigs pa'i de dang de'i yul lo //
translated: That which is the object of that, where the subsequent letter is not observed.

original: gang la pha rol 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: gang la pha rol 'gyur ba ni /
translated: That which is the subsequent transformation

original: de dang de'i cung zad tsam mo //
analyzed: de dang de'i cung zad tsam mo //
translated: is just that.

original: rang dang sa yig dag gi rnam par bcad pa'o //
analyzed: rang dang sa yig dag gi rnam par bcad pa'o //
translated: The elimination of the letters ra and sa.

original: tshig mthar zhes pa kho na'o //
analyzed: tshig mthar zhes pa kho na'o //
translated: Only at the end of a word.

original: tshig mthar gyur pa'i re pha dang sa yig dag rnam par bcad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshig mthar gyur pa'i re pha dang sa yig dag rnam par bcad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The letters ra and sa at the end of a word are eliminated.

analyzed: aa bhi bha:/du bhrinya 'dzin /
translated: Abhibhḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥḥ

original: hyasta n'i'i di'o //
analyzed: hyasta n'i'i di'o //
translated: The i of hyasthā.

original: dzuhohi sogs rnams kyi gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: dzuhohi sogs rnams kyi gnyis brjod do //
translated: The i of juhoḥ, etc.

original: bhrinya h'ang m'ang rnams kyi aita'o //
analyzed: bhrinya h'ang m'ang rnams kyi aita'o //
translated: The i of bhrīṅgā, māṅgā.

original: gsar byed las di si dag gi'o zhes pas de dbyi'o //
analyzed: gsar byed las di si dag gi'o zhes pas de dbyi'o //
translated: The i of sṛṣṭi, siddhi.

original: bats'a ba:/ pa ts'a ma:/
analyzed: bats'a ba:/ pa ts'a ma:/
translated: The i of pacati, pacāmi.

original: aa'i ba ma dag la zhes pas ring po'o //
analyzed: aa'i ba ma dag la zhes pas ring po'o //
translated: The i of āśīviṣa, āśīviṣa.

original: grub par gyur pa la sbyor ba brtsams pa ni nges pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: grub par gyur pa la sbyor ba brtsams pa ni nges pa'i don du'o //
translated: The application of the rules is begun for the sake of certainty.

original: byings kyi yul la tshig mthar rnam par bcad pa nyid du ji skad bshad pa bzhin du 'gyur mod /
analyzed: byings kyi yul la tshig mthar rnam par bcad pa nyid du ji skad bshad pa bzhin du 'gyur mod /
translated: In the domain of the roots, the ending of the word is indeed as explained.

original: 'dir mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir mi 'gyur te /
translated: But here it is not so.

original: a'a sma he /
analyzed: a'a sma he /
translated: Āsmahe.

original: gha dha dha bha rnams las dha min pa las ta tha dag gi dha'o //
analyzed: gha dha dha bha rnams las dha min pa las ta tha dag gi dha'o //
translated: From gha, dha, dha, bha, except for dha, of ta and tha, it is dha.

original: gha dang dha dang dha dang dha rnams las ta yig dang tha yig dha nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gha dang dha dang dha dang dha rnams las ta yig dang tha yig dha nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: From gha, dha, dha, bha, except for ta and tha, it becomes dha itself.

original: dha min pa ste dh'a nya las pha rol gyi ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dha min pa ste dh'a nya las pha rol gyi ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: From the other side, not from dha, it does not occur.

original: sgra med pa la dang po'o zhes pa gha dha dha bha rnams kyi dang po thob ba la'o //
analyzed: sgra med pa la dang po'o zhes pa gha dha dha bha rnams kyi dang po thob ba la'o //
translated: In the case of the non-aspirated, the first.

original: gha las / aa dugdha /
analyzed: gha las / aa dugdha /
translated: From ga, adugdha.🔽Adugdha.

original: aa dugdha:/ duha 'jo ba la'o //
analyzed: aa dugdha:/ duha 'jo ba la'o //
translated: From du, hosa.

original: ta dang th'asa'o //
analyzed: ta dang th'asa'o //
translated: From ta and tha, sa.

original: sana'o // bshad pa las 'jig go //
analyzed: sana'o // bshad pa las 'jig go //
translated: From sa, bhasa.

original: da dang po'i gha'o //
analyzed: da dang po'i gha'o //
translated: From da and pa, ga.

original: 'dis ta tha dag gi dha'o /
analyzed: 'dis ta tha dag gi dha'o /

analyzed: ga mi gang yin pa de dag gi san la au badh'a ring por 'gyur ro //

original: dzi gh'am sati /
analyzed: dzi gh'am sati /

original: 'dis ring po'o //
analyzed: 'dis ring po'o //

original: aa dhi dzi gh'am sa ti //
analyzed: aa dhi dzi gh'am sa ti //

original: 'dis ring po'o //
analyzed: 'dis ring po'o //

analyzed: aing smos pa ci zhe na /

original: dzi ga misha ti //
analyzed: dzi ga misha ti //

analyzed: gam las sa la pa rasmee la'o zhes pas aita'o //

analyzed: au ba dh'a kho na'i ring per 'gyur ba las au pa dha smos pa ni khyad par gzhan gsal ba'i don du'o //
translated: Only in upa is it long. The mention of upa is for the purpose of clarifying another exception.

analyzed: des na / ta no ti'i aita med pa'i san la ring por yang na 'gyur te /

analyzed: ti t'am sa ti ta no ti las san la aita rnam par brtag par bshad do //

analyzed: ti ta ni sha ti / n'a mina'i ra dang ba dag las gsal byed la ste kur tshur dag ma yin pa'i'o //

analyzed: na mi na'i gang ra ba dag la ste ra yig dang ba yig de dag pha rol la gsal byed pha rol can la ring por 'gyur te /

analyzed: ku ra'i sgras du krinya bzung ba yin gyi ku ru sgra la'o zhes pa 'di'i ni ma yin no //

analyzed: ku ri zhes ai yig gi nges par brten pa ma byas pa'i phyir ro //

original: bden te / aa'i yi ge thams cad kyi sgo'i gnas so zhes pa 'dir phyogs gcig la thams cad aa'i yi ge'i 'phel ba rnams su 'gyur zhing aa yig nyid ji lta bar 'gyur gyi aee aoo zhes pa 'di dag tu mi 'gyur ro zhes pas sbyor ba brtsams pa don🔽dang bcas pa'o //🔽aa sti'i'o // aas yod pa la'o zhes pa 'di'i aa'i yi ge gang yin pa de hyasta n'i pha rol la a'a yig tu bsgyur bar 'gyur ro //🔽aa dya ta n'i dang bya ba shor ba dag 'jug pa ma yin te /🔽de dag pha rol la bhu ru bsgyur ba byas ba la aa'i yi ge mi srid pa'i phyir ro //🔽aasti'i dang po zhes pas dbyi ba thob pa la'o //
analyzed: bden te / aa'i yi ge thams cad kyi sgo'i gnas so zhes pa 'dir phyogs gcig la thams cad aa'i yi ge'i 'phel ba rnams su 'gyur zhing aa yig nyid ji lta bar 'gyur gyi aee aoo zhes pa 'di dag tu mi 'gyur ro zhes pas sbyor ba brtsams pa don dang bcas pa'o // aa sti'i'o // aas yod pa la'o zhes pa 'di'i aa'i yi ge gang yin pa de hyasta n'i pha rol la a'a yig tu bsgyur bar 'gyur ro // aa dya ta n'i dang bya ba shor ba dag 'jug pa ma yin te / de dag pha rol la bhu ru bsgyur ba byas ba la aa'i yi ge mi srid pa'i phyir ro // aasti'i dang po zhes pas dbyi ba thob pa la'o //
translated: It is true, but all the a vowels are the door of the a vowel. Here, in one direction, all become the augment of the a vowel, and the a vowel itself becomes as it is, and these [vowels] e and o do not become. Therefore, the composition begun is meaningful.

original: aas yod pa la'o //

analyzed: dang po smos pa rjes su 'jug ste /

analyzed: ya la zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: aina'i ga zhes pas ga ru bsgyur ro //

analyzed: m'a'i sgra dang m'a sma'i sgras sbyor bar gyur pa na aa yig a'a ga ma la sogs pa mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When the word ma and the word ma are combined, the letter A does not come first, and so on.

original: m'a bha b'an /
analyzed: m'a bha b'an /

original: paksh'i ta / masmap'aksh'ita /
analyzed: paksh'i ta / masmap'aksh'ita /

original: aa'ing ring po'o //
analyzed: aa'ing ring po'o //

analyzed: moksh'ita / m'a m'asmoksh'ita /

original: 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro /
analyzed: 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro /

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /

original: m'a bha b'an /
analyzed: m'a bha b'an /

original: sa d'a m'a bha b'an shyat /

analyzed: yon tan no //

analyzed: 'dis mardza'i m'ardzi'o //

original: pari m'irdzanti / pir mri dzanti /
analyzed: pari m'irdzanti / pir mri dzanti /

analyzed: saha te / sha ha bzod pa la'o //

analyzed: ming gi byings dang shvakka'i 'ang mi 'dod de / shand'i ya ti /

original: shanda'i sgra las yina'o //
analyzed: shanda'i sgra las yina'o //

analyzed: shakkate / shvakka 'gro ba'i don to //

original: shthibu kla mu a'a tsam rnams kyi aan la'o zhes pa'i shes par byed pa las shthi bu'i sa nyid du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: shthibu kla mu a'a tsam rnams kyi aan la'o zhes pa'i shes par byed pa las shthi bu'i sa nyid du mi 'gyur te /

original: shth'i ba ti /
analyzed: shth'i ba ti /

analyzed: shthi bu kla mu a'a tsam rnams kyi zhes pas ring @248b po'o ;

analyzed: /shthi bu'i yang sha yig las pha rol gyi tha yig gi tha yig dag tu yang na'o zhes kha cig gsung ngo //

original: gang gi tshe tha yig yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe tha yig yin pa de'i tshe /

original: deshth'i byati / gang gi tshe tha yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: deshth'i byati / gang gi tshe tha yin pa de'i tshe /

original: testhi bya te /
analyzed: testhi bya te /

original: ya sgra'o // na mi'i ra ba dag gi zhes pas ring po'o //
analyzed: ya sgra'o // na mi'i ra ba dag gi zhes pas ring po'o //

original: gnyis pa bzhi pa dag gi dang po gsum pa dag go zhes pas tha'i ta dang tha'i ta'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa bzhi pa dag gi dang po gsum pa dag go zhes pas tha'i ta dang tha'i ta'o //

analyzed: ci stesa yig dang po byings thams cad rnams ci'i phyir bklag par bya ba min ci zhe na /

original: de ltar nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar nus pa ma yin no //

original: rkyen dang rnam 'gyur dang a'a ga ma gnas pa'i zhes pa'i tshig las rnam 'gyur gyis yig gi sha nyid du bsgrub par bya ba de mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rkyen dang rnam 'gyur dang a'a ga ma gnas pa'i zhes pa'i tshig las rnam 'gyur gyis yig gi sha nyid du bsgrub par bya ba de mi 'gyur te /

original: rnam 'gyur gyis yig mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam 'gyur gyis yig mi srid pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: des na lhag ma'ang ngo //

analyzed: byings kyi dang po'i na yig na nyid du 'gyur ro //

original: na ma ti /
analyzed: na ma ti /

analyzed: nam 'dud pa dang sgra la'o //

analyzed: na ya ti /

analyzed: n'inya thob pa la'o //

analyzed: byings kyi dang po'i zhes pa ci zhe na /

analyzed: bhana sgra la'o //

analyzed: ming gi byings dag gi mi 'dod de /

analyzed: rgyu mtshan la rkyen dang rnam 'gyur dang a'a ga ma la gnas pa'i sa'i sha nyid do //

analyzed: ring po'o // di'o //

original: tsana'o // phyis nyid kyi phyir k'a ri ta dbyi'o //
analyzed: tsana'o // phyis nyid kyi phyir k'a ri ta dbyi'o //

original: 'dis sngar brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis sngar brjod do //
translated: This was stated previously.

original: dbyangs kyi cho ga zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: dbyangs kyi cho ga zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the rule of the vowels?🔽Api syai.

original: a'a pi sye /
analyzed: a'a pi sye /
translated: O syai.

original: ao sy'a / y'i 'phel ba la'o //🔽pa ro& ksh'a'i ae'o //
analyzed: ao sy'a / y'i 'phel ba la'o // pa ro& ksh'a'i ae'o //
translated: The augment ya is for the increase.🔽Paro.🔽Because of the suffix sya, the augment pi is for paro and ksha.

original: 'dir phyis nyid kyi phyir sy'a ya'i pa ro& ksh'a la pi'o zhes pas pi ru bsgyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir phyis nyid kyi phyir sy'a ya'i pa ro& ksh'a la pi'o zhes pas pi ru bsgyur ro //
translated: Here, because of the suffix sya, pi is changed to ru.

original: de nas gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: de nas gnyis brjod do //
translated: Then, the two are stated.

original: dbyangs la zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: dbyangs la zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the rule of the vowels?

original: dze ghri ya te /
analyzed: dze ghri ya te /
translated: Zhe ghrī yate.

original: ghra dri lan pa la'o //
analyzed: ghra dri lan pa la'o //
translated: Ghrī is for the reply.🔽Ya is the sound.

original: ya sgra'o // ghra dhma dag gi a'i'o zhes pas a'i'o //
analyzed: ya sgra'o // ghra dhma dag gi a'i'o zhes pas a'i'o //
translated: Because of ghrā dham dhag i, the vowel i.

original: nges na gnyis brjod do //🔽gnyis brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes pa @250a * //
analyzed: nges na gnyis brjod do // gnyis brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan zhes pa @250a * //
translated: If it is certain, the two are stated.

original: ci zhe na ;
analyzed: ci zhe na ;
translated: What is the reason for the two being stated?

original: du dhu sha ti /
analyzed: du dhu sha ti /
translated: Du dhushti.

original: di bu rtse ba la'o //
analyzed: di bu rtse ba la'o //
translated: Di is for play.

original: sana'o // tsha ba dag gi lnga ba la'ang sha auta dag go zhes pas ba yig auta ru bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: sana'o // tsha ba dag gi lnga ba la'ang sha auta dag go zhes pas ba yig auta ru bsgyur ba'o //
translated: Because of sannau tshavau lnga ba lang sha aut dag go, the vowel u is changed to au.

original: 'dir au yig dbyangs gnyis brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir au yig dbyangs gnyis brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan ma yin no //
translated: Here, the reason for the expression of the two vowels u and i is not.

original: des na sngar dbyangs kyi cho ga ya nyid do //
analyzed: des na sngar dbyangs kyi cho ga ya nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the rule of the vowel ya is first.

original: de nas gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: de nas gnyis brjod do //
translated: Then, the expression of the two.

original: byas pa na zhes smos pa ni kha cig tu dbyangs kyi cho ga sngar 'jug pa'i don to //
analyzed: byas pa na zhes smos pa ni kha cig tu dbyangs kyi cho ga sngar 'jug pa'i don to //
translated: The statement “having done that” means that in some cases the rule of the vowel is to be applied first.

original: des na / aa ri ri sha ti /
analyzed: des na / aa ri ri sha ti /
translated: Thus, aririśati.

original: zhes pa 'dir gnyis brjod pa las sngon du yon tan grub bo //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dir gnyis brjod pa las sngon du yon tan grub bo //
translated: Here, the expression of the two is accomplished first.

original: 'o na aita med par 'ang san la gnyis brjod pa mthong ba'i phyir 'dir ji ltar aita gnyis brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na aita med par 'ang san la gnyis brjod pa mthong ba'i phyir 'dir ji ltar aita gnyis brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But since the expression of the two is seen in san even without iṭ, how can iṭ be the reason for the expression of the two here?

original: 'di yod mod 'on kyang 'dir aita a'a ga ma byas pa na aita dang bcas pa'i san dbyangs las dang por gnyis brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan no zhes pas yon tan las sngar gnyis brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di yod mod 'on kyang 'dir aita a'a ga ma byas pa na aita dang bcas pa'i san dbyangs las dang por gnyis brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan no zhes pas yon tan las sngar gnyis brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is true, but here, when iṭ is made to come first, the expression of the two is the reason for the vowel san with iṭ, and thus the expression of the two is before the quality.

original: gal te'ang aita rkyen gyi cha shas nyid du gyur na gnyis brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid du mi 'gyur na /🔽da dhi tha /
analyzed: gal te'ang aita rkyen gyi cha shas nyid du gyur na gnyis brjod pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid du mi 'gyur na / da dhi tha /
translated: If it were a part of the condition, it would not be the reason for the expression of the two.🔽The statement dadhitha would not be established.

original: zhes sogs grub par mi 'gyur bas gnyis brjod pa las sngon du aa dbyib 'jug pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes sogs grub par mi 'gyur bas gnyis brjod pa las sngon du aa dbyib 'jug pas de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because the vowel a is inserted before the expression of the two,

original: aa ri ri sha ti /
analyzed: aa ri ri sha ti /
translated: the statement aririshadi

original: zhes pa 'dir sngon du yon tan 'jug pa'i don du bya ba byas pa smos pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dir sngon du yon tan 'jug pa'i don du bya ba byas pa smos pa'o //
translated: is made for the purpose of inserting the quality before.

original: du dh'a nya 'dzin pa ro& ksha'i thala'o //
analyzed: du dh'a nya 'dzin pa ro& ksha'i thala'o //
translated: The statement duddhanayanam is for the purpose of inserting the vowel a before the consonant kṣa.

original: pa ro& ksha la sri bri bhri stu drung shru sru rnams nyid las pa ro& ksh'a la'o //
analyzed: pa ro& ksha la sri bri bhri stu drung shru sru rnams nyid las pa ro& ksh'a la'o //
translated: The statement parakṣālasridvibhṛtsuśruśruṇām is for the purpose of inserting the vowel a before the consonants p and kṣa.

original: kri la sogs pa rnams kyi nges pa las aita'o /🔽gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: kri la sogs pa rnams kyi nges pa las aita'o / gnyis brjod do //
translated: The statement iti is for the purpose of inserting the vowel i before the consonants kri and so on.

original: aita la yang ngo zhes pas a'a dbyi'o //
analyzed: aita la yang ngo zhes pas a'a dbyi'o //
translated: The statement iti is for the purpose of inserting the vowel a before the vowel i.🔽The statement na yadanusyujyate is for the purpose of excluding the vowel a from the vowel i.🔽The statement yacca na prayujyate is for the purpose of excluding the vowel a from the vowel i.🔽The statement tad anusvanībhūtam is for the purpose of excluding the vowel a from the vowel i.🔽The statement na yadanusyujyate is for the purpose of excluding the vowel a from the vowel i.

original: gang rjes su 'brel pa mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: gang rjes su 'brel pa mi sbyor ro //
translated: The statement yacca na prayujyate is for the purpose of excluding the vowel a from the vowel i.🔽The statement tad anusvanībhūtam is for the purpose of excluding the vowel a from the vowel i.🔽The statement na yadanusyujyate is for the purpose of excluding the vowel a from the vowel i.🔽The statement yacca na prayujyate is for the purpose of excluding the vowel a from the vowel i.

original: yi ge gang rnams kyi rab tu sbyar bya min pa rab tu sbyor ba med pa de ni rjes su 'brel ba'i ming can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yi ge gang rnams kyi rab tu sbyar bya min pa rab tu sbyor ba med pa de ni rjes su 'brel ba'i ming can du 'gyur ro //
translated: The statement tad anusvanībhūtam is for the purpose of excluding the vowel a from the vowel i.🔽The statement na yadanus

original: du kri nya'i du yig dang nya yig rjes su 'brel pa dag go //
analyzed: du kri nya'i du yig dang nya yig rjes su 'brel pa dag go //
translated: The letters du and ṇya are connected with the letter ṇḍa.

original: sngon gyi slob dpon gyi ming gi yan lag tu byas pa ni bya ba'i don brjod pa'i ming can du rtogs par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngon gyi slob dpon gyi ming gi yan lag tu byas pa ni bya ba'i don brjod pa'i ming can du rtogs par bya ba'i don to //
translated: The name of the former master is made into a part of the name, and is to be understood as having the meaning of the verbal root.

original: des na / ba yi ba tsi sogs rnams kyi ai yig tu gyur pa'i yang rab tu sbyor ba med pa nyid la ming can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na / ba yi ba tsi sogs rnams kyi ai yig tu gyur pa'i yang rab tu sbyor ba med pa nyid la ming can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the transformation of the letter i into the letter i in the words bāvac and so on is not a case of having the name.

original: gal te 'gyur na na yig a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: gal te 'gyur na na yig a'a ga ma'o //
translated: If it were, the letter na would be the following āgama.

original: ming can gang du dgos she na /
analyzed: ming can gang du dgos she na /
translated: Where is the name needed?

original: du rjes su 'brel pa las aa thu'o zhes pa la sogs pa rnams su'o //
analyzed: du rjes su 'brel pa las aa thu'o zhes pa la sogs pa rnams su'o //
translated: In the words āthāto and so on, where the letter ṇḍa is connected with the letter ṇa.

original: pe pa thu:/ tu be shi ka si g-yo ba la'o //
analyzed: pe pa thu:/ tu be shi ka si g-yo ba la'o //
translated: Tuveśikasaṃcaraṇa

original: tu rjes su 'brel pa las zhes pas aa thu'o //🔽sha sogs rnams shita ces pa'o //
analyzed: tu rjes su 'brel pa las zhes pas aa thu'o // sha sogs rnams shita ces pa'o //
translated: From the connection with the letter ṇa, it is āthāto.🔽Śa and so on are śita.

original: sha sogs rnams te sha dang sha dang sa dang ha rnams shita'i ming can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sha sogs rnams te sha dang sha dang sa dang ha rnams shita'i ming can du 'gyur ro //
translated: Śa, śa, sa, and ha become the name śita.

original: shita'i ming gis gang du dgos she na /
analyzed: shita'i ming gis gang du dgos she na /
translated: Where is the name śita needed?

original: aita med pa aita mtha' zhes pa la sogs pa rnams su'o //
analyzed: aita med pa aita mtha' zhes pa la sogs pa rnams su'o //
translated: In the words without ita and with ita and so on.

original: aa liksha @250b ta ;
analyzed: aa liksha @250b ta ;
translated: alikṣa.

original: li ha ro myang ba la'o //
analyzed: li ha ro myang ba la'o //
translated: liharomi.

original: di'o // sana'o //
analyzed: di'o // sana'o //
translated: diṣo.🔽 sanā.🔽 hīḍhā.

original: ha'i dha'o // sha dha dag gi sa la ka'o //
analyzed: ha'i dha'o // sha dha dag gi sa la ka'o //

analyzed: ai au rita mthar gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rnams sam pra s'a ra na'o //

analyzed: ai dang au dang rin ni ai au rita de rnams so //

analyzed: ai yig dang au yig dang ri yig de rnams ni sam pra s'a ra na'i ming can du 'gyur ro //

original: sam pra s'a ra na'i ming gang du dgos she na /
analyzed: sam pra s'a ra na'i ming gang du dgos she na /
translated: Where is the need for the name prasāranā?

original: mthar gnas pa pha rol gyi dbyangs dang bcas pa'i sam pra s'a ra na'o zhes pa la sogs pa rnams su'o //
analyzed: mthar gnas pa pha rol gyi dbyangs dang bcas pa'i sam pra s'a ra na'o zhes pa la sogs pa rnams su'o //

original: aidzya te / su sya te /
analyzed: aidzya te / su sya te /

original: sam grihya te /
analyzed: sam grihya te /

original: mthar gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rnams zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: mthar gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rnams zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: sa ma sthi te /
analyzed: sa ma sthi te /
translated: samasthite.

original: sth'a d'a dag gi aa dya ta n'i'i a'atma ne la ai'o zhes pas aa nyid do //
analyzed: sth'a d'a dag gi aa dya ta n'i'i a'atma ne la ai'o zhes pas aa nyid do //

analyzed: thung ngu las kyang aita med pa'i zhes pas si tsa dbyi'o ;

analyzed: / gal te 'di'i ai yig gi ming can du 'gyur na de mtha' ring po zhes pas ring por 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rgyu mtshan byas pas ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /

analyzed: sitsa dbyi ba byas pa na ni de la ring po thob pa la'o //

analyzed: aar dang mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge snga ma gnyis dag kyang yon tan no //

analyzed: au'i yi ge la ao zhes pa 'di rnams kyi mdos byas pa de rnams ni yon tan gyi ming can du 'gyur ro //

original: yon tan gyi ming gis gang du dgos she na /
analyzed: yon tan gyi ming gis gang du dgos she na /

original: gsungs pa / n'a mi mtha'i byings dang bi ka ra na dag gi yon tan no zhes pa la sogs pa rnams su'o ;

translated: have fulfilled their intentions

original: dang gangs can la //
analyzed: dang gangs can la //
translated: in the Land of Snows.

original: slob phan dga' ston bgyi ba'i slad //🔽sgra rig ji bzhin rtse mos bsgyur /
analyzed: slob phan dga' ston bgyi ba'i slad // sgra rig ji bzhin rtse mos bsgyur /
translated: In order to celebrate what is helpful to students,

original: // / grub pa nya na rjes su 'brel pa la ai tsa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: // / grub pa nya na rjes su 'brel pa la ai tsa bzhin du'o //
translated: I have translated this with the peak of eloquence, just as in the science of grammar.🔽The suffix nya is added to the root na, like in the word ica.

original: ai tsa lta bu ni ai tsa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: ai tsa lta bu ni ai tsa bzhin du'o //
translated: The suffix ica is like in the word ica.

original: nya dang na ni nya na dag ste /
analyzed: nya dang na ni nya na dag ste /
translated: Nya and na are nya,

original: de dag rkyen gang gi rjes su 'brel pa yin pa zhes rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: de dag rkyen gang gi rjes su 'brel pa yin pa zhes rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: and they are connected to whatever condition follows, as is explained.

original: dzra gri las krita shantring bi dag ma yin pa la'o zhes pa 'di las krita la zhes pa rjes su 'jug go //
analyzed: dzra gri las krita shantring bi dag ma yin pa la'o zhes pa 'di las krita la zhes pa rjes su 'jug go //
translated: From jra gri, krit is added to the negative, like in the word atrin.

original: nya yig rjes su 'brel pa dang na yig rjes su 'brel pa'i krita kyi rkyen pha rol la byings kyi bya ba ai tsa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: nya yig rjes su 'brel pa dang na yig rjes su 'brel pa'i krita kyi rkyen pha rol la byings kyi bya ba ai tsa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te /
translated: The action of the verbal root with respect to the other, when it is related to the suffix ya and when it is related to the suffix na, is like the action of the verbal root ica.

original: aitsa la gang bshad pa de nya yig dang na yig rjes su 'brel pa pha rol la'ang 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: aitsa la gang bshad pa de nya yig dang na yig rjes su 'brel pa pha rol la'ang 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that whatever is explained with respect to ica is also the case with respect to the other, when it is related to the suffix ya and when it is related to the suffix na.🔽pākaḥ,

original: p'a ka:/ p'a tsa ka:/
analyzed: p'a ka:/ p'a tsa ka:/
translated: pācakaḥ.🔽dupaṭaḥ

original: du pa tsa sha 'tshed pa la'o //
analyzed: du pa tsa sha 'tshed pa la'o //
translated: is for cooking.

original: 'tshed pa'o zhes pas dngos po la ghanya'o //
analyzed: 'tshed pa'o zhes pas dngos po la ghanya'o //
translated: Since it is cooking, there is gha in the case of the thing.🔽Since it is cooking, there are puṃdri-ca.

original: 'tshed par byed do zhes pas puna tri tsa dag go zhes pas buna'o //
analyzed: 'tshed par byed do zhes pas puna tri tsa dag go zhes pas buna'o //
translated: Since it is cooking, there is bun.

original: nya yig dang na yig dag 'di'i don to //
analyzed: nya yig dang na yig dag 'di'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the suffixes ya and na.

original: gha yig ni tsa dza dag gi ka ga ngag go zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gha yig ni tsa dza dag gi ka ga ngag go zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The letter gha is the ka, ga, ṅga of the ca, ja.

original: yu bu dzha rnams kyi zhes pas bu'i aa kar bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: yu bu dzha rnams kyi zhes pas bu'i aa kar bsgyur ba'o //
translated: Since it is the case of the ya, ra, la, va, the a of bu is changed to ka.

original: tsa dza dag gi ka ga dag go zhes pas tsa yig gi ka yig go //
analyzed: tsa dza dag gi ka ga dag go zhes pas tsa yig gi ka yig go //
translated: Since it is the ka, ga of the ca, ja, the letter ca is the letter ka.

original: ji ltar ai tsa pha rol la aa'i au pa dh'a zhes pas ring por bshad pa de ltar 'dir yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar ai tsa pha rol la aa'i au pa dh'a zhes pas ring por bshad pa de ltar 'dir yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as in the case of ica, the long [form] is explained by āyudha, so it is here also.🔽karah

original: ka ra:/ k'am ra ka:/
analyzed: ka ra:/ k'am ra ka:/
translated: karam, or

original: du krinya byed pa la'o //
analyzed: du krinya byed pa la'o //
translated: dukrī, in the sense of 'doing'.

original: byed pa'o zhes pas dngos po la ghanya'o //
analyzed: byed pa'o zhes pas dngos po la ghanya'o //
translated: 'Doing' [means] ghañ with respect to a thing.

original: byed do zhes pa snga ma bzhin du buna te aa kar bsgyur ba'ang ngo //
analyzed: byed do zhes pa snga ma bzhin du buna te aa kar bsgyur ba'ang ngo //
translated: 'Does' [means] bun as before, with the substitution of akara.

original: ai tsa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i phyir aa'i au pa dh'a zhes pa la sogs pas 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: ai tsa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i phyir aa'i au pa dh'a zhes pa la sogs pas 'phel ba'o //
translated: Because it is like ica, it is increased by āyudha, etc.

original: d'a ya:/ d'a ya ka:/
analyzed: d'a ya:/ d'a ya ka:/
translated: dāyakaḥ

original: ster ba'o zhes pas ghanya'o //
analyzed: ster ba'o zhes pas ghanya'o //
translated: 'Giving' [means] ghañ.

original: ster ro zhes pas buna'o //
analyzed: ster ro zhes pas buna'o //
translated: 'Gives' [means] bun.

original: ai tsa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i phyir a'ata mtha' rnams kyi ai tsa la a'a yi'o zhes pas a'a yi'o //
analyzed: ai tsa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i phyir a'ata mtha' rnams kyi ai tsa la a'a yi'o zhes pas a'a yi'o //
translated: Because it is like ica, it is āyi by āyai of the final ica of āy.

original: grub pa smos pa ni bkra shis pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: grub pa smos pa ni bkra shis pa'i don du'o //
translated: The mention of the accomplishment is for the sake of auspiciousness.🔽hanter tā

original: hanti'i ta'o // nya na rjes su 'brel pa la zhes pa rjes su 'jug go //
analyzed: hanti'i ta'o // nya na rjes su 'brel pa la zhes pa rjes su 'jug go //
translated: 'nyana, in the sense of 'connection', is added.

original: hanti'i ta nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: hanti'i ta nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: It becomes hanter tā itself.

original: nya yig dang na yig rjes su 'brel pa'i krita pha rol la'o //
analyzed: nya yig dang na yig rjes su 'brel pa'i krita pha rol la'o //
translated: The kṛt suffix is added to the root nyā with the affix na, and the meaning is “to the other side.”🔽ghātaḥ,

original: gh'ata:/ gh'ata ka:/ 'joms pa'o zhes byas nas dngos po la ghanya'o //
analyzed: gh'ata:/ gh'ata ka:/ 'joms pa'o zhes byas nas dngos po la ghanya'o //
translated: ghātakaḥ. Having made “to destroy,” the kṛt suffix is added to the root gha, and the meaning is “to destroy.”

original: 'joms so zhes pas buna'o //
analyzed: 'joms so zhes pas buna'o //
translated: ghātayati. Having made “to destroy,” the kṛt suffix is added to the root bhu, and the meaning is “to destroy.”

original: aa'i au pa dh'a zhes pas ring po'o //
analyzed: aa'i au pa dh'a zhes pas ring po'o //
translated: dīrghaḥ. Having made “to extend,” the kṛt suffix is added to the root dīr, and the meaning is “long.”

original: hanti'i ha'i ain ai tsa dag la ghi'o zhes pas he yig gi gha yig go //
analyzed: hanti'i ha'i ain ai tsa dag la ghi'o zhes pas he yig gi gha yig go //
translated: hanti, hī, īn, īca. The kṛt suffix gha is added to the root ha, and the meaning is “to kill.”

original: 'dis na'i ta'o //
analyzed: 'dis na'i ta'o //
translated: hīyate.

original: aita dang bcas pa aam mtha' wa mi ka mi tsam min pa rnams kyi ma yin no //
analyzed: aita dang bcas pa aam mtha' wa mi ka mi tsam min pa rnams kyi ma yin no //
translated: The kṛt suffix is not added to the roots ending in am and iṭ, and to the roots other than vamikam and icam.

original: byings aita dang bcas pa am mtha'i nya na rjes su 'brel pa'i krita pha rol la ai tsa dang 'dra ba'i bya bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽wa mi ka mi tsam min pa rnams kyi @251b ste ;
analyzed: byings aita dang bcas pa am mtha'i nya na rjes su 'brel pa'i krita pha rol la ai tsa dang 'dra ba'i bya bar mi 'gyur ro // wa mi ka mi tsam min pa rnams kyi @251b ste ;
translated: The kṛt suffix is not added to the roots ending in am and iṭ, and the root nyā is added to the other side, and the meaning is like “to kill.”🔽The kṛt suffix is not added to the roots other than vamikam and icam.

original: wa mi dang / ka mi dang tsam rnams kyi ni dgag par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: wa mi dang / ka mi dang tsam rnams kyi ni dgag par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: The kṛt suffix is not added to the roots vamikam, icam, and icam.🔽śāntaḥ,

original: sha ma:/ sham ka:/
analyzed: sha ma:/ sham ka:/
translated: śaṅkaḥ,🔽tamas,

original: ta ma:/ tam ka:/
analyzed: ta ma:/ tam ka:/
translated: tamakah.

original: sha mu nye bar zhi ba la'o //
analyzed: sha mu nye bar zhi ba la'o //
translated: śāmu is for “to be pacified.”

original: ta mu 'dod pa la'o //
analyzed: ta mu 'dod pa la'o //
translated: tamas is for “to desire.”

original: zhi ba'o // 'dod pa'o zhes pas dngos po la ghanya'o //
analyzed: zhi ba'o // 'dod pa'o zhes pas dngos po la ghanya'o //
translated: The root śam means peace, and kām means desire.

original: zhi bar byed do 'dod par byed do zhes pa bu na tri tsa dag go zhes pas bu na te aa kar bsgyur /
analyzed: zhi bar byed do 'dod par byed do zhes pa bu na tri tsa dag go zhes pas bu na te aa kar bsgyur /

original: aitsa dang 'dra bar 'gyur bar 'gag pas ring po med do //
analyzed: aitsa dang 'dra bar 'gyur bar 'gag pas ring po med do //

analyzed: de bzhin du / sha m'i / ta m'i ste zhi ba'i ngang tshul lo // 'dod pa'i ngang tshul lo //
translated: Similarly,

analyzed: zhes pas sham la sogs pa brgyad rnams kyi ghi ni na'o //
translated: the affixes -tṛc and -tṛc are added to śam and tam, respectively, to form śāntayati and tāmayati.🔽 The affixes -tṛc and -tṛc are added to śam and tam, respectively, to form śāntayati and tāmayati.

original: na yig ni aitsa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i don to //
analyzed: na yig ni aitsa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i don to //

analyzed: ai yig ni brjod pa'i don to //
translated: The letter i has the meaning of -it.

original: gha yig ni tsa dza dag gi ka ga dag go zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gha yig ni tsa dza dag gi ka ga dag go zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The letter gha has the meaning of -ka and -ga for ca and ja.

analyzed: gal te yang dper brjod pa 'di rnams la aita a'a ga ma med mod de lta na'ang /
translated: Although these examples do not have -itc and -it, still,

analyzed: aita dang bcas pa smos pas 'dir aita dang bcas pa'i byings rnams nye bar mtshon par bya'o //

analyzed: sdom pa'o ; / sngom par byed do zhes kyang tshig rnam par sbyar ro //

analyzed: gal te de la na / au da ya ma:/

original: au pa ra ma:/
analyzed: au pa ra ma:/

analyzed: ci ltar yin te /

translated: YAM and RAM are not with IT.🔽It is true, but

analyzed: tsa mu za ba la'o //

translated: Gha, Ṇa, Ḍha, Bha, Ya, Ra, La, Va, Śa, Ṣa, Sa, and Ha.🔽🔽

analyzed: ci ltar yin te /

original: 'di las dgag pa thob pas so zhe na /
analyzed: 'di las dgag pa thob pas so zhe na /

original: brjod par bya ste ;
analyzed: brjod par bya ste ;

analyzed: aam nad la'o //

analyzed: tsur sogs las kyang ngo zhes pas aina'o //

analyzed: aa'i au pa dh'a ring po'o //

original: bi shr'am:/ shra mu dka' dub la ste skyo ba la'o //
analyzed: bi shr'am:/ shra mu dka' dub la ste skyo ba la'o //

analyzed: bi snga ma dang ghanya /

analyzed: ji ltar zhe na brjod par bya ste sbyor ba 'di ni legs pa ma yin gyi //
translated: How? It will be explained. This application is not good.

original: bi shra ma:/ zhes pa ltar 'byung bar bya'o //
analyzed: bi shra ma:/ zhes pa ltar 'byung bar bya'o //
translated: viśramaḥ.

original: d'i dh'i be b'i dag gi'ang ngo //
analyzed: d'i dh'i be b'i dag gi'ang ngo //
translated: It is also of dīdhi and veva.

original: ma yin no zhes pa kho na'o //
analyzed: ma yin no zhes pa kho na'o //
translated: It is not so, only.

original: d'i dh'ing gsal ba la'o //
analyzed: d'i dh'ing gsal ba la'o //
translated: Dīdhi is for manifestation.

original: be b'id bya dga' mtshungs pa la'o zhes pa 'di dag gi nya na rjes su 'brel pa pha rol la aitsa dang 'dra ba'i bya bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽a'a d'i dhya ka:/
analyzed: be b'id bya dga' mtshungs pa la'o zhes pa 'di dag gi nya na rjes su 'brel pa pha rol la aitsa dang 'dra ba'i bya bar mi 'gyur ro // a'a d'i dhya ka:/
translated: Veva is for equalizing the reward. In these, the suffix iṭ is not used for the action of the other.🔽ā dīdhikaḥ.

original: aa d'i dhya ka:/🔽a'a be bya ka:/
analyzed: aa d'i dhya ka:/ a'a be bya ka:/
translated: a dīdhikaḥ.🔽ā vevyakaḥ.

original: a'a be bya ka:/
analyzed: a'a be bya ka:/
translated: ā vevyakaḥ.

original: gsal bar byed pa'i dang tshul dang bya dga' mtshungs pa'i dang tshul lo zhes pa ni nti him si zhes pas bunya'o //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa'i dang tshul dang bya dga' mtshungs pa'i dang tshul lo zhes pa ni nti him si zhes pas bunya'o //
translated: Manifestation and equalizing the reward. This is bunyo by ntihiṃsi.

original: gsal bar byed do bya dga' mtshungs par byed do zhes pas buna'o //
analyzed: gsal bar byed do bya dga' mtshungs par byed do zhes pas buna'o //
translated: It manifests, it equalizes the reward. This is bunyo.

original: ai'i yi ge zhes pas ya'o //
analyzed: ai'i yi ge zhes pas ya'o //
translated: By the letter i, it is ya.

original: sha la byings thams cad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sha la byings thams cad pa bzhin no //
translated: Like all the roots in śa.

original: sha rjes su 'brel pa la zhes pa rjes su 'jug ste mdo phyi ma dag la'o //
analyzed: sha rjes su 'brel pa la zhes pa rjes su 'jug ste mdo phyi ma dag la'o //
translated: The suffix -ya is added to the root -śa in the sense of following or subsequent to the latter sūtras.

original: sha rjes su 'brel pa'i rkyen pha rol la byings thams cad pa dang 'dra ba'i dngos por 'gyur te /
analyzed: sha rjes su 'brel pa'i rkyen pha rol la byings thams cad pa dang 'dra ba'i dngos por 'gyur te /
translated: The condition that is related to the root -śa becomes like the all-base.

original: byings thams cad pa la gang bshad pa de sha yig rjes su 'brel pa la'ang 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: byings thams cad pa la gang bshad pa de sha yig rjes su 'brel pa la'ang 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that what is explained in the all-base also applies to the root -śa that is related.

original: dzu hva tra /
analyzed: dzu hva tra /
translated: juhoti

original: hu sbyin pa la'o //
analyzed: hu sbyin pa la'o //
translated: hu means to give.

original: da ltar ba la shanting zhes pas shantinga'o //
analyzed: da ltar ba la shanting zhes pas shantinga'o //
translated: In the present, it is śantam.

original: nga yig ni nga la yon tan ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: nga yig ni nga la yon tan ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The letter a means not in me, that is, not in me.

original: ri yig ni aud dang ri zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ri yig ni aud dang ri zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The letter ri means ud and ri.

original: sha yig ni 'di'i don to //
analyzed: sha yig ni 'di'i don to //

original: byings thams cad pa dng 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i phyir aan bi kar na'o //
analyzed: byings thams cad pa dng 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i phyir aan bi kar na'o //
translated: Because it becomes like the all-base, it is anvikṛti.

original: dzu ho ti la sogs pa rnams las 'jig go //
analyzed: dzu ho ti la sogs pa rnams las 'jig go //
translated: It is destroyed from juhoti and so on.

original: dzu ho ti la sogs pa rnams kyi gnyis brjod pa'o //
analyzed: dzu ho ti la sogs pa rnams kyi gnyis brjod pa'o //

original: dzu ho ti'i byings thams cad la'o zhes pas wa nyid do //
analyzed: dzu ho ti'i byings thams cad la'o zhes pas wa nyid do //
translated: Because it is said juhoti is for all bases, it is vānya.

original: aa bhy'a sta las dbyi'o zhes pas na yig dbyi'o //
analyzed: aa bhy'a sta las dbyi'o zhes pas na yig dbyi'o //
translated: The letter ya is the form of the word avya, because of the word avya.🔽The word pacana, cooking, is the form of the word pacati.

original: pa tsa na /🔽pa tha na /
analyzed: pa tsa na / pa tha na /

original: snga ma bzhin du shantringa'o //🔽aan bi ka ra na'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du shantringa'o // aan bi ka ra na'o //
translated: As before, the word santri is the form of the word santri.🔽The word anvikarana is the form of the word anvikarana.

original: aa dang mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge dbyi'o //🔽nga la yon tan ma yin /
analyzed: aa dang mtshams sbyor gyi yi ge dbyi'o // nga la yon tan ma yin /

analyzed: nga rjes su 'brel pa'i rkyen pha rol la yon tan 'gyur bam yin no //

analyzed: bi da na / li ha na /

original: su nva na /
analyzed: su nva na /

original: bid shes pa la'o //
analyzed: bid shes pa la'o //

original: li ha ro myang ba la'o //🔽shunya 'khrud pa la'o //
analyzed: li ha ro myang ba la'o // shunya 'khrud pa la'o //

analyzed: snga ma bzhin du shantring dang aan bi ka ra na'o //

original: aad sogs las 'jig go //
analyzed: aad sogs las 'jig go //

analyzed: su la sogs pa las nu'o //

analyzed: nu'i bi ka ra na'o zhes pas wa nyid do // kal yan bzhin 'ang ste ya la brjod pa bor ba'o // yal bshad pa ni ya la brjod pa'o //

analyzed: bri dzi las tsur la sogs pa nyid kyi phyir aina'o //🔽kri tya yug rnams gzhan la'ang zhes pas nama'o //

analyzed: ka rjes su 'brel ba'i rkyen la yan dang 'dra ba'i @252b dngos por 'gyur zhing /

analyzed: gang ya yig la bshad pa yan dang a'a sh'isha dag la'o zhes pa la sogs pa de dor ba'o zhes pa'i don to //

original: kri ta:/ kri ta wa na /
analyzed: kri ta:/ kri ta wa na /

original: hri ta:/ hri ta w'a na:/
analyzed: hri ta:/ hri ta w'a na:/

original: bya ba'o // byed do //
analyzed: bya ba'o // byed do //

analyzed: 'phrog pa'o // 'phrog go zhes pa nishtha'o zhes pas kta dang kta wantu'o //

analyzed: yan dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i phyir yon tan med do //

original: grih'eta:/ grih'ita w'an /🔽'dzin par byas zin to //
analyzed: grih'eta:/ grih'ita w'an / 'dzin par byas zin to //

analyzed: 'dzin par byed zin to //

analyzed: snga ma bzhin du kta dang kta wantu'o //

analyzed: aita'o // gra hi las pa ro& ksha min pa la aita'i ring po'o //

original: ya la brjod pa bor ba'o zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: ya la brjod pa bor ba'o zhes pa ci zhe na /

translated: Here, the ya of yā is like ya, and the ya of yā is like a, śa, and ṣa. And since the ya of yā is like a, śa, and ṣa, the i and ā that follow do not become long.

original: dza gri'i krita la shanting bi dag ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: dza gri'i krita la shanting bi dag ma yin pa la'o //

original: sad pa'o zhes pas ghanya'o //

original: gang rnams kyi dang po ruta sogs rnams so //
analyzed: gang rnams kyi dang po ruta sogs rnams so //
translated: The suffix iṇa is added to the roots kuśa, guda, mṛd, mṛt, and bṛhat.🔽The suffix

analyzed: skamttv'a / syamttv'a / byed pa po gcig dag gi snga ma'i dus la'o zhes pas ktv'a'o//

original: pra skarda / prasyadya /
analyzed: pra skarda / prasyadya /
translated: pra-

original: tshig sdud la 'byung ba la zhes pas ktv'a'i rkyen gyi yaba'o //
analyzed: tshig sdud la 'byung ba la zhes pas ktv'a'i rkyen gyi yaba'o //
translated: The affix ktvā is added to the reduplicated form.

original: yon tan can nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir aa nu sham ga dbyi'o //
analyzed: yon tan can nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir aa nu sham ga dbyi'o //
translated: The affix anuśayana is added to the reduplicated form, because it does not become a quality.

original: gsal byed dang po au ai au pa dh'a can gyi wa min pa'i yang na'o //
analyzed: gsal byed dang po au ai au pa dh'a can gyi wa min pa'i yang na'o //
translated: The affix na is added to the reduplicated form, except for the first consonant and the one having i or u as the first vowel.

original: au dang ai ni au dang ai dag go //
analyzed: au dang ai ni au dang ai dag go //
translated: i and u are i and u.

original: au dang ai dag gang gi au pa dh'a yin pa de ni au dang ai au pa dh'a can no //
analyzed: au dang ai dag gang gi au pa dh'a yin pa de ni au dang ai au pa dh'a can no //
translated: That which has i or u as its first vowel is one having i or u as the first vowel.

original: gang la wa yig gi mtha' med pa de ni pa min pa ste ba min pa de'i'o //
analyzed: gang la wa yig gi mtha' med pa de ni pa min pa ste ba min pa de'i'o //
translated: That which does not have the letter va at the end is not va, that is, not ba.

original: dang po dbyi'o zhes pa'i tshig las mtha'i sbra dbyi'o //
analyzed: dang po dbyi'o zhes pa'i tshig las mtha'i sbra dbyi'o //
translated: The affix is the final one, according to the statement the first is the base.

original: byings gsal byed dang po can au yig dang ai yig gi au pa dh'a can ba yig mtha' can min pa'i ktv'a'i rkyen aita dang bcas pa'i yang na yon tan can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byings gsal byed dang po can au yig dang ai yig gi au pa dh'a can ba yig mtha' can min pa'i ktv'a'i rkyen aita dang bcas pa'i yang na yon tan can du 'gyur ro //
translated: The affix iṭ is added to the reduplicated form having the first consonant, having i or u as the first vowel, and not having ba at the end, and it becomes a quality.

original: aita dang bcas pa'i ktv'a yon tan can no zhes pas rtag tu yon tan nyid du thob pa la'o //🔽tyo ti tv'a /
analyzed: aita dang bcas pa'i ktv'a yon tan can no zhes pas rtag tu yon tan nyid du thob pa la'o // tyo ti tv'a /
translated: With the addition of ai, ktvā is having the nature of a quality, so it is for always having the nature of a quality.🔽 Tyoditvā🔽Dhoditvā

original: dho ti tv'a /🔽lo kha tvi /
analyzed: dho ti tv'a / lo kha tvi /

original: li khi tv'a ;
analyzed: li khi tv'a ;
translated: Likhitvā

original: gsal byed dang po can la zhes pa ci zhe na /🔽ae shi tv'a /
analyzed: gsal byed dang po can la zhes pa ci zhe na / ae shi tv'a /
translated: What is meant by having the first consonant?🔽 Aiṣitvā

original: ao shi tv'a /
analyzed: ao shi tv'a /

original: ai shu 'dod pa la'o //
analyzed: ai shu 'dod pa la'o //

original: ausha bsreg pa la'o //
analyzed: ausha bsreg pa la'o //

analyzed: au ai au pa dh'a can na'i zhes pa ci zhe na /

analyzed: na rta tv'i /

original: nvi t'i lus rnam par 'gyur ba la'o //
analyzed: nvi t'i lus rnam par 'gyur ba la'o //

original: wa min pa'i zhes pa ci zhe na /🔽de ba tv'i /
analyzed: wa min pa'i zhes pa ci zhe na / de ba tv'i /
translated: What is meant by not having va?🔽 Devattvit

original: thams cad aita dang bcas pa'i ktva yon tan can no zhes pas yon tan can nyid do //
analyzed: thams cad aita dang bcas pa'i ktva yon tan can no zhes pas yon tan can nyid do //
translated: With the addition of ai, ktvā is having the nature of a quality, so it is for having the nature of a quality.

original: aita dang bcas pa zhes pa ci zhe na /🔽nuttv'a / bhittv'a /
analyzed: aita dang bcas pa zhes pa ci zhe na / nuttv'a / bhittv'a /
translated: What is meant by with the addition of ai?🔽 Nuditvā🔽Bhiditvā

original: nud bskul ba la'o //
analyzed: nud bskul ba la'o //

original: bhi dir rnam par 'joms pa la'o //
analyzed: bhi dir rnam par 'joms pa la'o //

original: au ai au pa dha can gyi zhes pa 'di las au yig dang a'i yig dag 'dzin pa ma yin te bshad pa las so //
analyzed: au ai au pa dha can gyi zhes pa 'di las au yig dang a'i yig dag 'dzin pa ma yin te bshad pa las so //
translated: In this case, the u and ai letters are not taken from u and ai, but from the explanation.

original: gsal byed dang po can au ai au pa dh'a can wa yig mtha' can ma yin pa'i gang aita dang bcas pa'i san de ni yang na yon tan can nyid du bshad par bya'o //🔽ru ro tsi sha te /
analyzed: gsal byed dang po can au ai au pa dh'a can wa yig mtha' can ma yin pa'i gang aita dang bcas pa'i san de ni yang na yon tan can nyid du bshad par bya'o // ru ro tsi sha te /
translated: The saṃjñā of the first sibilant, the one with u, i, u, and p, the one ending in va, the one not ending in va, the one with ita, is to be explained as having the quality.🔽ru ru ci śati

original: ru ru tsi sha te /🔽li le khi sha ti /

analyzed: aita dang bcas pa zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: bi bhat+sati / bhi dir rnam par 'joms pa la'o //
analyzed: bi bhat+sati / bhi dir rnam par 'joms pa la'o //
translated: vi bhat sa ti🔽tri śi

analyzed: tri shi / mri shi /

analyzed: yang na zhes pa 'jug ste /

analyzed: shing sung zhes pa 'di las gong du'o //

analyzed: nyitrisha skom pa la'o //

analyzed: mrisha bzod pa la'o //

analyzed: krisha chung ngur byed pa la'o //

analyzed: panytsa 'gro ba'i don no //

analyzed: luntsa nges par sel ba la'o //

original: ri ti mdo las 'byugn ba'i byings so //

original: mrishi tv'a / karshitv'a /
analyzed: mrishi tv'a / karshitv'a /

analyzed: aarti tv'a / ri ti tv'a /

original: yon tan can nyid kyi phyogs la yon tan te /
analyzed: yon tan can nyid kyi phyogs la yon tan te /
translated: In the case of the quality of the good, the good is

original: banytsi lunytsi dag gi'ang aa nusham ga dbyi bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: banytsi lunytsi dag gi'ang aa nusham ga dbyi bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Vac and Luñc, but they do not have the anusvāra.

original: aita dang bcas pa zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: aita dang bcas pa zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: baktv'a / banytsu 'gro bam la'o//
analyzed: baktv'a / banytsu 'gro bam la'o//

original: auta rjes su 'brel pa dang pung zhes pa'i phyogs la aita'i yon tan nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir aa nu sham ga dbyi'o //
analyzed: auta rjes su 'brel pa dang pung zhes pa'i phyogs la aita'i yon tan nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir aa nu sham ga dbyi'o //
translated: In the case of the connection of the prefix and the root, iṭ does not have the quality of the good, so it has the anusvāra.

original: rita ces pas ri yig mtha' rnams gzung bar mi bya ste bshad pa las so //
analyzed: rita ces pas ri yig mtha' rnams gzung bar mi bya ste bshad pa las so //
translated: Since it is said by Rita, the ri suffix is not taken, because it is explained.

original: tha dang pha mtha' rnams kyi'ang aa nu sham ga can rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: tha dang pha mtha' rnams kyi'ang aa nu sham ga can rnams kyi'o //

original: tha yig dang pha yig mtha' can rnams kyi byings rnams kyi'ang aa nu sham ga can rnams kyi ktv'a'i rkyen la yang na yon tan can nyid do //🔽granthitv'a / grathitv'a /
analyzed: tha yig dang pha yig mtha' can rnams kyi byings rnams kyi'ang aa nu sham ga can rnams kyi ktv'a'i rkyen la yang na yon tan can nyid do // granthitv'a / grathitv'a /

analyzed: gumphitv'a / gu phi tv'a /

analyzed: grantha gzhung sgrig pa la'o //

analyzed: gum pha 'khyud pa la'o //
