analyzed: tha dang pha mtha' rnams kyi zhes pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is meant by “the ones ending in tha and pha”?🔽śaṃsitā

original: shansi tv'a / aita dang bcas pa'i ktv'a yon tan can no zhes pas yon tan can nyid do //
analyzed: shansi tv'a / aita dang bcas pa'i ktv'a yon tan can no zhes pas yon tan can nyid do //

original: aa nu sham ga can rnams kyi zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: aa nu sham ga can rnams kyi zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: ko thi tv'a /
analyzed: ko thi tv'a /

original: re phi tv'a /
analyzed: re phi tv'a /
translated: rephita

original: ku tha rul bar 'gyur ba la'o //
analyzed: ku tha rul bar 'gyur ba la'o //

original: ri pha dang ri na pha 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: ri pha dang ri na pha 'gro ba la'o //
translated: ripha and riṇāpha mean “to go.”

original: dza mtha' dang na sha rnams kyi aita med pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: dza mtha' dang na sha rnams kyi aita med pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The ones ending in ja and naśa are without iṭ.

original: aa nu sham ga can rnams kyi zhes pa kho na'o //
analyzed: aa nu sham ga can rnams kyi zhes pa kho na'o //
translated: It is only the ones having anuśama.

original: byings dza yig gi mtha' can aa nu sham ga can aita med pa rnams kyi dang na shi'i'ang ktv'a'i rkyen yon tan can du yang na 'gyur ro //🔽bhamktv'a / bhaktv'a /
analyzed: byings dza yig gi mtha' can aa nu sham ga can aita med pa rnams kyi dang na shi'i'ang ktv'a'i rkyen yon tan can du yang na 'gyur ro // bhamktv'a / bhaktv'a /
translated: The ones ending in the syllable ja, having anusvāra, and without iṭ, and also the ones of na and śa, have the condition of ktvā with the quality of the benefitial.🔽bhaktavā, bhaktavā.

original: ramktv'a / raktv'a /
analyzed: ramktv'a / raktv'a /
translated: raktavā, raktavā.

original: bhanydzo nyed pa la'o //
analyzed: bhanydzo nyed pa la'o //
translated: bhaj, to enjoy.

original: ranydza tshos pa la'o //
analyzed: ranydza tshos pa la'o //
translated: rañj, to dye.

original: yu dzi ru dzi zhes pas aita med do //
analyzed: yu dzi ru dzi zhes pas aita med do //

original: namshtv'a / nashtv'a /
analyzed: namshtv'a / nashtv'a /

original: na sha mi mthong ba la'o //
analyzed: na sha mi mthong ba la'o //

analyzed: radha sogs nyid kyi phyir aita rnam bar brtag pa'o //

original: masdzi na sha dag gi dhuta la'o zhes pas na yig a'a ga ma'o //
analyzed: masdzi na sha dag gi dhuta la'o zhes pas na yig a'a ga ma'o //
translated: masj, naś, dhut, therefore the letter na is āgama.

original: tsha sha dag gi 'ang po zhes pas sha'o //
analyzed: tsha sha dag gi 'ang po zhes pas sha'o //

original: yon tan can nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyogs la aa nu sham ga dbyi'o //
analyzed: yon tan can nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyogs la aa nu sham ga dbyi'o //

original: aa nu sham ga can rnams kyi zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: aa nu sham ga can rnams kyi zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: yuktv'a / yu dzir sbyor pa la'o //
analyzed: yuktv'a / yu dzir sbyor pa la'o //

original: aita med pa rnams kyi zhes pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: aita med pa rnams kyi zhes pa ci zhe na /

original: aanydzi tv'a / aanydzu gsal pa la'o //
analyzed: aanydzi tv'a / aanydzu gsal pa la'o //

original: sh'ing pud dhri shikshvi dishvi di ming rnams kyi aita dang bcas pa'i nishth'a'o //
analyzed: sh'ing pud dhri shikshvi dishvi di ming rnams kyi aita dang bcas pa'i nishth'a'o //
translated: The words śaṅ, puṅ, dṛṣ, śikṣ, vibh, diś, and dim have the suffix niṣṭha.

original: sh'ing nyal ba la'o //
analyzed: sh'ing nyal ba la'o //
translated: Śaṅ is used for lying down.

original: pung dag par byed pa la'o //
analyzed: pung dag par byed pa la'o //

original: nyi dhrish'a spyi brtol can la'o //
analyzed: nyi dhrish'a spyi brtol can la'o //

original: nyi kshvi d'a snum pa dang rmongs pa dag la'o //
analyzed: nyi kshvi d'a snum pa dang rmongs pa dag la'o //

original: shvi d'a lus kyi rngam 'byung ba la'o //
analyzed: shvi d'a lus kyi rngam 'byung ba la'o //

original: nyi mi d'a snum pa la'o //
analyzed: nyi mi d'a snum pa la'o //

original: 'di rnams kyi nishth'a'i rkyen aita dang bcas pa ni yon tan can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi nishth'a'i rkyen aita dang bcas pa ni yon tan can du 'gyur ro //

original: ka la yan bzhin zhes pa dgag pa thob pa rnams so //
analyzed: ka la yan bzhin zhes pa dgag pa thob pa rnams so //

analyzed: pra sve di ta: pra sve di ta w'an / pra me di ta:/
